comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
Build an RCP using PDE Build
Run the update manager from the generated product

More information:
I am building an RCP using the PDE Build (ie http://help.eclipse.org/help32/topic/org.eclipse.pde.doc.user/guide/tasks/pde_product_build.htm).

The build executes fine, but when I run the generated product and run the update manager, the following exception is thrown after connecting to an update site I have built locally:

What is very strange is that if I generate the RCP product using the Eclipse GUI Product Configuration Editor "Export Product Wizard" I am able to successfully run the update manager to the same update site.

I need to use the PDE Build feature to integrate into my existing product's build process.

This bug can be closed.

I determined the error was caused by having the outputUpdateJars=true property set in the build.properties.  Setting this back to false resolved the issue.
